DOC.brief_summary: This double-blind , multicenter study assess efficacy safety E6201 topical administration pre-identified marker lesion adult subject chronic plaque type psoriasis . Treatment duration 8 week , follow 4-week period without treatment . Pharmacokinetic sample obtain pre-and post treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Paired-Comparison Study Evaluating Efficacy Safety E6201 Versus Vehicle Treatment Plaque-Type Psoriasis

If participant abnormal clinical laboratory test find meet specify criterion , participant retested repeat blood draw clinical laboratory assessment . If abnormal test finding confirm , participant exclude study .
